name: country cottage mittens
sizes_available: toddler, child, adult small, adult medium, adult large
notes:
this is the ad-free, easy to print version of this pattern. you can find the free version on my website theturtletrunk.com

the country cottage mittens crochet pattern works up quickly and easily! these mittens feature gorgeous texture and the pattern includes 5 sizes ranging from toddler to adult large! you can make a pair for everyone in the family! 

difficulty - advanced beginner

standard us terms

supplies
- medium (4) weight yarn
- 5.00mm (h) crochet hook
- scissors
- yarn needle 
- stitch marker

sizes: toddler, child, adult small, adult medium, and adult large

pattern includes:
- detailed written instructions with color coded sizes
- gauge pattern
- link to the free video tutorial
- special stitch instructions with photos
- photos for reference
